kbDescription: An AI-driven cloud assistant executes AWS-related tasks using Node.js
secretsDescription:
- Visit [AWS Sign Up](http://aws.amazon.com/), create a new account (aws offer a 1 year free trial), and log in.
- Click on your username in the upper-right corner and select "Security Credentials."
- Click on "Users" in the sidebar and select your username.
- Go to the "Security Credentials" tab and click "Create Access Key."

That's it! You now have your AWS Secret Key and Access Key ID.
secretsTitle: How to Get Your "AWS Secret Key" and "Access Key ID"?
